heroes.name: Subhas Chandra Bose
heroes.description: Indian freedom fighter and strategic military leader who formed the Indian National Army. A true patriot and tactical genius.

heroes.name: Vinayak Damodar Savarkar
heroes.description: Revolutionary freedom fighter, political philosopher, and advocate of Hindutva. A strategic thinker and fearless patriot.

heroes.name: Nathuram Godse
heroes.description: Controversial figure who believed in decisive action for his principles. A complex personality in Indian history.

heroes.name: Mangal Pandey
heroes.description: Indian soldier who sparked the 1857 rebellion against British rule. Symbol of courage and resistance.

heroes.name: Immadi Pulakeshi
heroes.description: Chalukya emperor who successfully resisted Harsha's expansion. Master of military strategy and diplomacy.

heroes.name: Chakravarti Vikramaditya
heroes.description: Legendary emperor known for his wisdom, valor, and just rule. Symbol of ideal kingship in Indian tradition.

heroes.name: Maharana Pratap
heroes.description: Rajput warrior king who never surrendered to Mughal rule. Embodiment of courage and independence.

heroes.name: Shivaji Maharaj
heroes.description: Founder of the Maratha Empire, master of guerrilla warfare and statecraft. A symbol of Swarajya and Hindu pride.

heroes.name: Baji Rao Peshwa I
heroes.description: Maratha general and statesman, undefeated in battle. Expanded Maratha power across India with bold cavalry tactics.

heroes.name: Guru Gobind Singh
heroes.description: Tenth Sikh Guru, warrior-saint who established the Khalsa. Perfect blend of spirituality and martial prowess.

heroes.name: Adi Shankaracharya
heroes.description: Philosopher who consolidated Advaita Vedanta and established four cardinal monasteries. Intellectual giant of ancient India.

heroes.name: Vallabhacharya
heroes.description: Philosopher and devotional teacher who founded Pushti Marg. Advocate of pure devotion and divine grace.

heroes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte
heroes.description: French emperor and military genius who reshaped Europe through strategy, law, and administration.

heroes.name: Oda Nobunaga
heroes.description: Japanese daimyo and unifier who set the foundation for the unification of Japan. Fearless and innovative leader.

heroes.name: Niccol√≤ Machiavelli
heroes.description: Italian Renaissance political philosopher, author of 'The Prince'. Advocate of pragmatic and realist statecraft.

interests.title: Strategic Warfare
interests.description: Study of military tactics, ancient Indian warfare, and geopolitical strategy. Inspired by leaders like Shivaji, Baji Rao, Napoleon, and Nobunaga.

interests.title: Indian Philosophy
interests.description: Deep exploration of Vedanta, dharmic traditions, and spiritual texts. Seeking truth through ancient wisdom of Shankaracharya and Vallabhacharya.

interests.title: Geopolitics
interests.description: Analysis of global power dynamics, international relations, and strategic competition between nations.

interests.title: Psychology & Behavior
interests.description: Understanding human nature, cognitive biases, and behavioral patterns in decision-making and conflict. A key to leadership and statecraft.

interests.title: Dharmic Traditions
interests.description: Study of Hindu, Buddhist, and Jain philosophical schools and their practical applications in modern life.

interests.title: Intelligence Analysis
interests.description: Methods of information gathering, analysis, and strategic intelligence in both historical and modern contexts. Inspired by Chanakya and Machiavelli.

interests.title: Leadership Studies
interests.description: Learning from the successes and failures of great leaders like Shivaji, Baji Rao, Napoleon, and Guru Gobind Singh.

hobbies.title: Chess
hobbies.description: Strategic board game that develops tactical thinking, pattern recognition, and long-term planning abilities.

hobbies.title: Go (Weiqi)
hobbies.description: Ancient strategy game of territory and influence. Teaches systems thinking and strategic patience.

hobbies.title: Historical Research
hobbies.description: Deep study of Indian history, military campaigns, and the lives of great leaders and philosophers.

hobbies.title: Conflict Analysis
hobbies.description: Analyzing historical and contemporary conflicts to understand strategic principles and tactical innovations.

hobbies.title: Philosophy Discussions
hobbies.description: Engaging in deep philosophical debates about ethics, metaphysics, and the nature of reality and duty.

hobbies.title: Meditation & Reflection
hobbies.description: Daily practice of mindfulness and self-reflection based on dharmic principles and Vedantic teachings.

hobbies.title: Martial Arts & Swordsmanship
hobbies.description: Exploring traditional combat techniques and warrior codes inspired by Rajputs, Marathas, and Samurai.

hobbies.title: Writing & Strategy Journals
hobbies.description: Documenting insights on leadership, strategy, and philosophy in a structured manner like Machiavelli and Chanakya.
